LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.label: crawler
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.description: Small bug-like robots. While not particularly sturdy, their speed, size and numbers more than make up for it. A tiny plasma cutter at their front allows them to cut through metal like butter. Their favorite passtime is open surgery.
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.tools.0.label: plasma cutter
LanguageData.Mech_Crawler.tools.1.label: front legs
LanguageData.Corpse_Mech_Crawler.label: crawler corpse
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.label: skullywag
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.description: The skullywag is a light armored mechanoid with one thing on it's artificial mind: Incapacitate all hostiles. Beware its paralyzing cattle prod. It can also force your doors open.
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.tools.0.label: front paralyze component
LanguageData.Mech_Skullywag.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Corpse_Mech_Skullywag.label: skullywag corpse
LanguageData.Mech_Flamebot.label: flamebot
LanguageData.Mech_Flamebot.description: A small mechanoid that spews fire. Though they are lightly armored, they can quickly cause chaos within your colony.
LanguageData.Mech_Flamebot.tools.0.label: igniter
LanguageData.Corpse_Mech_Flamebot.label: flamebot corpse
LanguageData.Mech_Mammoth.label: mammoth
LanguageData.Mech_Mammoth.description: Mammoths are heavily armored, heavily armed combat mechanoids. These will be a challenge to take down. They are protected with a heavy duty EMP shield. Mammoths will sometimes try to break through your walls.
LanguageData.Mech_Mammoth.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Mech_Mammoth.tools.1.label: tusk
LanguageData.Mech_Mammoth.tools.2.label: leg
LanguageData.Corpse_Mech_Mammoth.label: mammoth corpse
LanguageData.Mech_Assaulter.label: assaulter
LanguageData.Mech_Assaulter.description: The assaulter is a heavy combat mechanoid. It's built in front shield protects it from most gunfire.
LanguageData.Mech_Assaulter.tools.0.label: shield
LanguageData.Mech_Assaulter.tools.1.label: gun protrusion
LanguageData.Corpse_Mech_Assaulter.label: assaulter corpse
